abstract: Within the oil and gas industry, known for audacious mergers, Kinder Morgan's chief executive has a reputation for shrewdness.
snippet: Within the oil and gas industry, known for audacious mergers, Kinder Morgan's chief executive has a reputation for shrewdness.
lead_paragraph: With its $21.1 billion acquisition of the El Paso Corporation, Kinder Morgan will become the nation's biggest empire of oil and gas pipelines. Michael J. De La Merced notes at the Dealbook blog that the company's chief executive, Richard D. Kinder, has come a long way since his once-small company bought the castoffs of his former employer, Enron.
